page.title: 05SWIMMING IN THE WINDRUSH
page.content: In the morning we get ready to go swimming in the Windrush river.We go all day, so we take our dinner with us.We go to Windrush for my uncles,and go down to the river.The river is not very wide,but it is quite deep. Sometimes we bring some inner tubes to float around on.After a good swim we have our dinner on the bank. After dinner we have races on the inner tubes.Sometimes we have jumping competitions.At about 4 o'clock we have our tea.Then we get ourselves dry.We put on our clothes and get ready to leave.We walk through Windrush Manor,down the lane to my Nan's cottage.We get indoors and get change into our clothes,get into the car and go home to Sherborne.
